forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 47. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 28. West wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun graces Boston with clear skies, illuminating the city in soft, golden light, a delightful contrast to the lingering chill of early spring. With temperatures bordering on 47 degrees, it beckons residents to step outside and savor the crisp air, enhanced by a gentle westward breeze. As twilight approaches, the temperature will dip to a comfortable 28 degrees, promising a serene evening under a canopy of stars.

Today’s clarity calls for a refreshing jaunt to your favorite café or a leisurely stroll along the Esplanade, where the scent of blooming daffodils mingles with the fresh air. Dress in layers to accommodate the fluctuating temperatures; a light sweater over a long-sleeved shirt will keep you comfortable during the day’s warmth while a thicker coat or scarf will serve you well as nightfall descends. The pleasant conditions are perfect for enjoying a quiet moment with a good book in your favorite park or catching up with a friend over a warm drink, as Boston revels in a beautiful spring day.
